section.heading: Opioid overdose reversal medications—Bulk purchasing and distribution program

content.p: All medicaid contracted managed health care organizations must participate in the opioid overdose reversal medication bulk purchasing and distribution program established in RCW 70.14.170 once the program is operational.

The health care authority must participate in the opioid overdose reversal medication bulk purchasing and distribution program established in RCW 70.14.170 once the program is operational for purposes of individuals enrolled in medical assistance under this chapter that are not enrolled in a managed care organization and are uninsured individuals. [ 2023 c 51 s 45 ; 2021 c 273 s 12 .] NOTES: Rules — 2021 c 273 ss 7-12: See note following RCW 70.14.170 . Findings — Intent — 2021 c 273: See note following RCW 70.41.480 .
